mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.login_name AS "loginName", a.name AS "name", a.password AS "password", a.email AS "email", a.province_id AS "provinceId", a.city_id AS "cityId", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.full_name AS "fullName", a.telphone AS "telphone", a.status AS "status", a.kind AS "kind", a.gender AS "gender", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.degree AS "degree", a.photo_path AS "photoPath", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a8.name AS "area.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a8 ON a8.id = a.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users( login_name, name, password, email, province_id, city_id, area_id, full_name, telphone, status, kind, gender, birthday, degree, photo_path, create_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{loginName}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{area.id}, #{fullName}, #{telphone}, #{status}, #{kind}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{degree}, #{photoPath}, #{createDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET login_name = #{loginName}, name = #{name}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, province_id = #{provinceId}, city_id = #{cityId}, area_id = #{area.id}, full_name = #{fullName}, telphone = #{telphone}, status = #{status}, kind = #{kind}, gender = #{gender}, birthday = #{birthday}, degree = #{degree}, photo_path = #{photoPath}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
